## DatabaseConnection.sessionId property

Underlynig database connection (session) id.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly sessionId: string;
```

## Remarks

This value may help identify a particular connection when a connection pool is involved, or identify the corresponding session on the database server side.
